知乎.definition: Zhihu, Chinese Q&A website modeled on Quora, at zhihu.com, launched in Jan 2011

知人善任.definition: (idiom) expert at appointing people according to their abilities; to put the right people in the right places

知人善用.definition: see 知人善任[zhi1 ren2 shan4 ren4]

知人知面不知心.pinyin: zhī rén zhī miàn bù zhī xīn
知人知面不知心.definition: one may know a person for a long time without understanding his true nature (idiom)

知人者智，自知者明.pinyin: zhī rén zhě zhì ， zì zhī zhě míng
知人者智，自知者明.definition: those who understand others are clever, but those who know themselves are truly wise (idiom, from Laozi's 道德經|道德经[Dao4 de2 jing1]

知其不可而為之.pinyin: zhī qí bù kě ér wèi zhī
知其不可而為之.definition: to keep going resolutely despite knowing the task is impossible (idiom)

知其然而不知其所以然.pinyin: zhī qí rán ér bù zhī qí suǒ yǐ rán
知其然而不知其所以然.definition: (idiom) to know that it is so but not why it is so

知冷知熱.definition: to know whether others are cold or hot (idiom); to be very considerate

知名度.definition: reputation; profile; familiarity in the public consciousness

知子莫若父.definition: nobody understands one's son better than his father (idiom)

知州.definition: senior provincial government official in dynastic China

知己.definition: to know oneself; to be intimate or close; intimate friend

知己知彼.definition: know yourself, know your enemy (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3])

知己知彼，百戰不殆.pinyin: zhī jǐ zhī bǐ ， bǎi zhàn bù dài
知己知彼，百戰不殆.definition: know yourself and know your enemy, and you will never be defeated (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3])

知府.definition: prefectural magistrate (during Tang to Qing times)

知彼知己.definition: to know the enemy and know oneself (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War")

知彼知己，百戰不殆.pinyin: zhī bǐ zhī jǐ ， bǎi zhàn bù dài
知彼知己，百戰不殆.definition: knowing the enemy and yourself will get you unscathed through a hundred battles (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War")

知恥.definition: to have a sense of shame

知悉.definition: to know; to be informed of

知情.definition: to know the facts; to understand; to be familiar with the situation

知情人.definition: person in the know; insider; informed source

知情達理.definition: see 通情達理|通情达理[tong1 qing2 da2 li3]

知慳識儉.definition: (idiom) to know how to be economical

知易行難.definition: easy to grasp but difficult to put into practice (idiom); easier said than done

知會.definition: to inform; to tell; to notify; notification

知母.definition: Anemarrhena asphodeloides; rhyzome of Anemarrhena (used in TCM)

知法犯法.definition: to know the law and break it (idiom); consciously going against the rules

知無不言，言無不盡.pinyin: zhī wú bù yán ， yán wú bù jǐn
知無不言，言無不盡.definition: lit. not hiding anything he knows, not stopping before he has said it through (idiom); fig. frank; outspoken

知識越多越反動.pinyin: zhī shí yuè duō yuè fǎn dòng
知識越多越反動.definition: the more knowledgeable, the more reactionary (absurd anti-intellectual slogan attributed after the event to the Gang of Four 四人幫|四人帮[Si4 ren2 bang1])

知足.definition: content with one's situation; to know contentment (hence happiness)

知遇之恩.definition: lit. the kindness of recognizing sb's worth and employing him (idiom); patronage; protection

知過改過.definition: to acknowledge one's faults and correct them (idiom)

知道.definition: to know; to become aware of; also pr. [zhi1dao5]

知錯能改.definition: to recognize one's mistakes and be able to reform oneself (idiom)

知難而退.definition: lit. to sound out the difficulties and retreat to avoid defeat (idiom); fig. to back out of an awkward situation; to get out on finding out what it's really like

知青.definition: educated youth (sent to work in farms during the Cultural Revolution), abbr. for 知識青年|知识青年[zhi1 shi5 qing1 nian2]
